heroSection.shortIntro: Building scalable AI & automation solutions for real-world impact.

aboutSection.bio: I am a highly motivated Full-Stack AI Developer with a strong foundation in data analysis, machine learning, and computer vision. I specialize in building scalable AI-powered products, LLM-based systems, and robust automation testing frameworks for real-world applications. I thrive on problem-solving, continuous learning, and applying AI advancements to drive impactful solutions. With strong team collaboration skills and a commitment to quality, I am passionate about creating systems that make a difference.

summary.statement: I am a Software Engineer with a passion for leveraging AI and automation to solve practical problems. With a background in building scalable systems, LLM integrations, and advanced automation frameworks, I focus on creating efficient, high-quality solutions. I am eager to continue expanding my expertise in AI and automation while delivering impactful projects.
summary.name: Kamel Ahmed

education.description: Graduated with Excellent (GPA 3.48). Developed an advanced kidnap detection system using computer vision and deep learning.

description: Designed and implemented advanced AI-powered products using LLMs.
Developed a modern RAG system with custom semantic chunking.
Built LLM-as-a-Service APIs with secure RESTful endpoints.
Integrated AI-enhanced development tools to boost efficiency.
Developed and optimized .NET backend services for AI orchestration.
Collaborated with teams to design scalable, secure AI solutions.
Built a full-scale automation testing framework from scratch.
Designed scalable Page Object Model structures.
Developed parameterized tests with JUnit5 and Cucumber.
Integrated tests into CI/CD pipelines, improving deployment efficiency.
Managed and optimized Oracle and MySQL databases, supported GCP applications.

portfolioSection.description: Uses deep learning and OpenCV to detect kidnapping and violence in real-time, with vehicle and license plate recognition.
Modern RAG system with semantic chunking to enhance information retrieval relevance.
Full-scale automation framework integrated with CI/CD pipelines and API testing.

testimonialsSection.name: Ahmed Mostafa
testimonialsSection.quote: Kamel demonstrated exceptional technical and problem-solving skills, delivering scalable AI solutions efficiently and collaboratively.

testimonialsSection.name: Sara Khaled
testimonialsSection.quote: Working with Kamel was a pleasure. His automation frameworks streamlined our testing cycles and ensured high software quality.

certifications: Google Data Analysis Professional Certificate – Coursera
Machine Learning Fundamentals Using Python – Datacamp
Data Analysis with Python Career Track – Datacamp
